entry.title: Digital Representation and the Text Model
entry.summary: Dino Buzzetti, 2002. Digital Representation and the Text Model. New Literary History, 33(1), p. 61-88.

div.p: Dino Buzzetti, 2002. Digital Representation and the Text Model. New Literary History, 33(1), p. 61-88. http://www.jstor.org/stable/pdfplus/20057710.pdf
This entry is part of my series Readings on digital objects
